availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Waits (Harrison County KY farmhand )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, student and farmhand. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Son of Richard Waits and Sarah Vanderen Waits. Married to Nannie E. Martin Waits in Harrison County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1864. Student in Harrison County in 1850. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 101B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 613.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216898, p. 312-13.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #16974.
